pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:5.1: 91-93. The training rules on getting trainee nuns/novice nuns/female lay people to massage
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:6.2: At that time the nuns were getting trainee nuns to massage and rub them … novice nuns to massage and rub them … female lay people to massage and rub them.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:6.3: When people who were walking about the dwellings saw this, they complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:6.4: “How can nuns get female lay people to massage and rub them? They are just like lay people who indulge in sensual pleasures.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:7.1: The nuns heard the complaints of those people.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:7.2: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:7.3: “How can nuns get female lay people to massage and rub them?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:7.4: “Is it true, monks, that nuns do this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:7.7: How can nuns get female lay people to massage and rub them?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:7.8: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:7.9: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:8.1: ‘If a nun gets (a trainee nun … a novice nun …) a laywoman to massage her or to rub her, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:9.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Orders through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:10.2: one who has trained for two years in the six rules.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:10.4: a female training in the ten training rules.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:10.6: a female who lives in a house is what is meant.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:11.2: if she gets massaged, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:12.2: if she gets rubbed, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:13.5: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc91:14.1: The eighth, ninth, and tenth training rules are finished.
